title: Prime or Not
text:
Given the number, you are to answer the question: "Is it prime?"Solutions to this problem can be submitted in C, C++, Pascal, Perl, Python, Ruby, Lisp, Hask, Ocaml, Prolog, Whitespace, Brainf**k and Intercal only.Inputt– the number of test cases, thenttest cases follows. [t ≤ 500]Each line contains one integer:N[2 ≤N≤ 263-1]OutputFor each test case output string "YES" if given number is prime and "NO" otherwise.ExampleInput:5
2
3
4
5
6Output:YES
YES
NO
YES
NO
